title: Golden Triangle Tour With Amritsar
text:
Golden Triangle Tour With Amritsar Golden Triangle Tour With Amritsar 0 
The Golden triangle tour with Amritsar is very popular amongst tourists especially the foreigners as it covers some of the cultural gems of India. The tour can also be done via train as some of the most popular trains including the Shatabdi express runs between Delhi and Agra and Delhi and Jaipur. On the map, these cities roughly stretch to about 250 km along each side of the equilateral triangle. Hence, it has been named as the Golden Triangle. 
What to expect in this tour 
One can immerse in the history and culture of India in the Golden triangle tour with Amritsar Get ready to experience the massive forts, the bustling markets and street life of New Delhi and the beauty of Rajasthan's places. Some of the packages offered by popular tourist operators include english speaking guide, accommodation in a three star or a five star hotel and a comfortable private air conditioned vehicle. One also has the option to choose the hotels of their choice in some of the packages.That are not all. Some of them also operate the tour with Amritsar as a add on. The tour would cover some of the best cultural places in India starting from Delhi that houses the Qutub Minar, Red Fort, Rajghat, Lotus Temple, Akshardham temple and then proceeding to Agra where the world wonder Taj Mahal is located. From Agra, the next stop would be Jaipur where the famous Hawa Mahal and Jantar Mantar is present to name a few. The final stop would be at Amritsar that is home to the Golden Temple and then return to Delhi. 
The Golden triangle tour with Amritsar is most ideal for tourists who would want to explore the different facets of India and soak into its rich culture and heritage. Many people who are well versed in traveling usually prefer to do this tour all by themselves instead of going through a tourist operator. It is also important to time this tour properly so that one can avoid the scotching Delhi summers usually in the month of April-June. One can also find a lot of blogs on this famous circuit and get to know about the history of these places in depth before visiting them to understand and appreciate the beauty when they visit. 
Conclusion 
New Delhi, the national capital of India has a lot to offer for everyone. The Golden triangle tour with Amritsar that begins from Delhi and covers Jaipur and Agra is definitely a traveler's delight. Furthermore, if it can be combined with Amritsar as well, one would have captured a glimpse of India in a nutshell. If you are opting for a Tour operator to cover this trip, ensure to read the internet for the best ones and then choose your pick. There are a lot of players in this market who offers these tour packages. Hence it is important to go for the best. One can also try their bargaining skills to negotiate the price of the tour while making the booking. If you have not experienced this tour, then now is the right time to do so!
